authorInfo.title: About the Author
authorInfo.description: Rachel Thompson is a human resources expert specializing in talent acquisition, employee engagement, and organizational culture development.

materialsUsed: Ulrich, D. (2013). HR Champions. Harvard Business Press.
Pink, D. (2009). Drive: The Surprising Truth About What Motivates Us. Riverhead Books.
Buckingham, M. (2001). First, Break All the Rules. Gallup Press.
Harvard Business Review (2022). "Future of Work" - Human Resources Management Journal.

keyTakeaways.title: Key Takeaways
keyTakeaways.description: Building a strong organizational culture requires intentional effort in recruitment, development, and retention. Focus on employee engagement and continuous feedback.
